Quick Attack.description: A quick strike that usually hits first.

Bubble.description: Fires bubbles that may lower the target's speed.

Ember.description: A weak fire attack that may inflict a burn.

Flamethrower.description: A powerful fire attack that may inflict a burn.

Fire Blast.description: An extremely powerful fire attack that may inflict a burn.

Vine Whip.description: Strikes the target with a vine-like whip.

Leaf Blade.description: Slashes with a sharp leaf. High critical hit ratio.

Solar Beam.description: Gathers light energy for one turn, then attacks on the next turn.

Thundershock.description: A weak electric attack that may paralyze the target.

Thunderbolt.description: A powerful electric attack that may paralyze the target.

Thunder.description: An extremely powerful electric attack that may paralyze the target.

Rock Slide.description: Causes rocks to slide down on the target. May cause flinching.

Earthquake.description: A powerful ground attack that hits all adjacent targets.

Shadow Ball.description: Throws a shadowy blob that may lower the target's Special Defense.

Dark Pulse.description: Releases a wave of terrible thoughts. May cause flinching.

Slam.description: Slams the target with a long tail, vine, etc.

Scratch.description: Scratches the target with sharp claws.

Metal Claw.description: Attacks with steel claws. May raise the user's Attack.

Stone Edge.description: Stabs with a sharpened stone. High critical hit ratio.

Synthesis.description: Restores the user's HP. The amount varies with the weather.

Growth.description: The user's body grows, raising its Attack and Special Attack.

Nightmare.description: A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts damage every turn.

Dream Eater.description: Takes one half the damage inflicted on a sleeping target.

Harden.description: Stiffens the user's body to raise Defense.

Defense Curl.description: Curls up to conceal weak spots and raise Defense.

Rollout.description: Attacks for five turns with rising power.

Agility.description: Relaxes the body to sharply boost Speed.
